divs: Sighting DetailsHusband saw it first and I came out back to observe it. couldn't tell its size, seemed to have back view of object, observed bright blue and white lights from back of object which seemed to be hovering over one spot, then it moved slowly, then it dissapeared suddenly out of sight
trends: There has been one other sighting in Reliance
There were no other sightings in Reliance on or around March 30th 2012
Summary: hovering object with blue and white bright lights no sound suddenly dissapeared
